archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Student Allocator
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: Module Selection / Allocation/activity selection and change Modules and programmes are maintained by curriculum archuitects some manual set up of modules - they are not consistent between systems Used by Student Advisers to create a programme of study e.g. for students who need to re-take exams - web interface Used for making module choice by students, workshop sign ups, module change and activity changes.
